root.name: Bakusou Dekotora Densetsu GB Special: Otoko Dokyou no Tenka Touitsu
root.description: OverviewBakusou Dekotora Densetsu GB Special: Otoko Dokyou no Tenka Touitsu is a racing game developed and published by Kid for the Game Boy Color platform. Bakusou Dekotora Densetsu GB Special: Otoko Dokyou no Tenka Touitsu was never released outside of Japan.
